purpose: Enable real-time, bi-directional data synchronization between PostgreSQL databases and client-side applications.
principle: Utilizes Conflict-free Replicated Data Types (CRDTs) to ensure consistent data replication and synchronization across distributed systems.
reusability: Offers APIs and libraries for integration with existing Postgres databases, supports offline-first applications with automatic conflict resolution.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex data types and large-scale deployments.
name: electric
highlight: Seamless real-time synchronization between Postgres and client applications using CRDTs.
